MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「倒した…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I beat him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I beat him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「倒しちゃった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I finally beat him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I finally beat him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時風に…この世界のゲームマスターに勝ってしまった!!
MESSAGE.EN: I beat Tokikaze... I beat this world's game master!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I beat Tokikaze... I beat this world's game master!!

MESSAGE.JP: これで、この世界はあたしのものだ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Now this world belongs to me!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Now this world belongs to me!!

MESSAGE.JP: これからはあたしがこの世界のゲームマスターなんだ!!
MESSAGE.EN: From now on I am this world's game master!!
MESSAGE.Translation: From now on I am this world's game master!!

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「やった!!　ばんざーーい!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I did it!! Hooray!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I did it!! Hooray!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くん、待っててね。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun, wait for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun, wait for me.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ会えるから。
MESSAGE.EN: We'll see each other soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'll see each other soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 行こう、新たな世界へ。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's go, to the new world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's go, to the new world.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日も皆で一緒に登校。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to school with everyone again today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to school with everyone again today.

MESSAGE.JP: とは言っても、学舎は寮と隣接しているから、鞄を持って、この渡り廊下を渡るだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I say that, the school building and dorm are right next to each other, so I'm just grabbing my bag and walking down the hall.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I say that, the school building and dorm are right next to each other, so I'm just grabbing my bag and walking down the hall.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「でも、就職決まったら遊び放題なんだろ？　いいねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So once you get a job, you'll have all the free time you want till March? Ain't that nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So once you get a job, you'll have all the free time you want till March? Ain't that nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それでもこの中庭の自然を見ながら歩けることは、開放感をえられる貴重な時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, the time we could spend walking and enjoying the beautiful nature of the courtyard was precious and soothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, the time we could spend walking and enjoying the beautiful nature of the courtyard was precious and soothing.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そんな気楽なもんじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It won't be that laid back, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It won't be that laid back, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「色々考えていかなくちゃいけないことがあるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There are a lot of things I have to think about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There are a lot of things I have to think about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「人生設計？　早いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your life's plan? So soon?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your life's plan? So soon?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「今だけしかできないことがあるってことよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝No, about things that can only be done now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No, about things that can only be done now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも一年後には、僕たちも受験か、就職活動やってるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... next year, we'll be preparing for college exams or looking for a job, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... next year, we'll be preparing for college exams or looking for a job, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ここまで一緒だったオレたちも、その後は、散り散りになるかもな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even though we've always been together so far, we might become separated from each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even though we've always been together so far, we might become separated from each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「少なくとも沙耶は一年先にそうなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝At least it'll already be so for Saya one year earlier than us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝At least it'll already be so for Saya one year earlier than us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「考えたくねーな、そんな先のこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't even wanna think about it... that kind of future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't even wanna think about it... that kind of future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「今がずっと続けばいいのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If only this could last forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If only this could last forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは、なんとも心強い一言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words were profoundly reassuring.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words were profoundly reassuring.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶が願うなら、本当にそうなるような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought it would surely come true if only Saya wished so.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought it would surely come true if only Saya wished so.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、昔みたいに、みんなで何かしない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, why don't we do something, like in the old days?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, why don't we do something, like in the old days?❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから僕はそう提案していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I suggested.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suggested.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、唐突に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's this all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's this all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何かって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What do you want to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What do you want to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、小学生の時。何かを悪に仕立て上げては近所をかっぽしてたでしょ、みんなで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Remember grade school? We'd go around the neighborhood and look for bad guys and beat them up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Remember grade school? We'd go around the neighborhood and look for bad guys and beat them up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえらと一緒にするな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I didn't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I didn't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶なら、そうしてくれるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Saya would definitely go along.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saya would definitely go along.

MESSAGE.JP: １０年という月日が経っても、僕と同じ気持ちでいたから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because, even though ten years have already passed, she still felt the same way I did.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because, even though ten years have already passed, she still felt the same way I did.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、今も、沙耶は僕たちのリーダーだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Besides, even now she was our leader.
MESSAGE.Translation: Besides, even now she was our leader.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その手がスカートに潜る。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand in her skirt...
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand in her skirt...

MESSAGE.JP: そこから何かを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: And pulled something out.
MESSAGE.Translation: And pulled something out.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「…諜報活動を行おう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...Let's be spies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...Let's be spies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一丁の銃を。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a gun.

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕以外はその言葉が理解できなかったようで怪訝な声をあげている。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone, dumbfounded by Saya's words, exclaimed in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone, dumbfounded by Saya's words, exclaimed in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「諜報活動よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Spies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Spies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度皆に向き直り、そう告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around and announced it to us again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around and announced it to us again.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「諜報機関を作る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝We'll form a spy organization.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝We'll form a spy organization.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「機関名は…学園革命スクレボよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The organization's name will be... School Revolution.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The organization's name will be... School Revolution.❞
